snippet: Authorities in El Paso on Wednesday released the names of two men who died in a shooting at a Department of Veterans Affairs mental health clinic at Fort Bliss on Tuesday.
abstract: El Paso authorities release names of two men who died in shooting at Department of Veterans Affairs mental health clinic at Fort Bliss; say Army veteran Jerry Serrato killed psychologist Timothy Fjordbak before shooting himself.
lead_paragraph: Authorities in El Paso on Wednesday released the names of two men who died in a shooting at a Department of Veterans Affairs mental health clinic at Fort Bliss on Tuesday.

headline.main: Texas: Fort Bliss Shooter and Victim Identified
